ai-tha-ap431:0.3_0: As a result, he was expecting more senior monks
ai-tha-ap431:1.2_0: then he went forth to homelessness.
ai-tha-ap431:2.2_0: world’s Elder, unskilled in the world,
ai-tha-ap431:2.3_0: At a time when the dark ones arose,
ai-tha-ap431:4.4_0: my belly is going to my back.
ai-tha-ap431:5.1_0: Awakened as a fully awakened Buddha,
ai-tha-ap431:5.3_0: Who gets your heart’s release by love
ai-tha-ap431:6.1_0: he is endowed with good qualities,
ai-tha-ap431:6.3_0: I was gold colored in a golden skin,
ai-tha-ap431:7.3_0: To me, I am always mindful
ai-tha-ap431:8.3_0: the horn blower and the earth there
ai-tha-ap431:10.1_0: I’ve tied the root of a tree,
ai-tha-ap431:10.4_0: for no-one is found in me.
ai-tha-ap431:11.4_0: acting as ruler of the gods.
ai-tha-ap431:13.1_0: He has attained the deathless state,
ai-tha-ap431:13.4_0: Now there is no further existence.
ai-tha-ap431:14.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap431:15.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap431:17.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap431:18.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Soṇa.
ai-tha-ap431:19.1_0: The ninth part of the senior monks.
